title: Dragonslayer Diana
body:
Drew a dragonslayer skin for Diana, since they needed a mid laner, and I thought making her abilities look all fiery would be really cool. Plus she needs to be blonde in at least one of her skins. :D
http://i.imgur.com/x0DrqGo.jpg
You can see all my league art on my Tumblr:
http://getnickld.tumblr.com/

replies.body:
one word....

[img]http://i.imgur.com/khYHwHs.gif[/img]
That gif is fantastic lol.

That looks amazing. 

But Diana should have been in the blood moon set since well... moon. I really think they should still do it in place of Akali
I'm sure that's exactly why they haven't done a Blood Moon Diana yet: Too obvious, too easy.

Ask not the fire why it fire

why the fire fire light fire

or fire fire glowing fire fire

fire.
Beautiful.
Oh, god, yes. Fire orbs and Q, closing wings particles on E, mini-fly on R. Looooooving it.
Exactly what I was thinking! I was gonna do some of the abilities but I got tired D:
Np, if you end doing the particles upload them, pls, we would love see them!

:O omg yes

1000x yes this is amazing
this looks more like shyvanna
Well, yeah. Shyvana is a dragon lady, and this is a lady in a dragon outfit, sooooooo...
lol

Her weapon looks less like a ancient sickle sword, and more like a Kukri.
Which is awesome.
Good job man!
This is fantastic! Just add her brand as a crest on her helmet and she'd be perfect!
It's good but, i main diana, and i don't feel diana's personality inside of this skin concept. The theme is ok but i think it needs few tweaks :)
Do the other Dragonslayer skins match the personality of the champ? No, not really, ESSPECIALLY Braum.
would consider buy RP again.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_ovqpM3Hmds

I love this concept.

The artwork is really neat too, well done.
I would play so much Diana if this was real... I LOVE IT!!!

Long ago there were myths about strange, yet powerful beings horded precious artifacts and crystals, including moonstone. This was a time when Dragons ruled Runeterra. Diana heard whispers about tales of these powerful, yet selfish hoarders called Dragons and how they once possessed a moonstone. Rejuvenated by such tales of possessing such a precious stone of tremendous power, she geared up; ready to slay any Dragon in her path. This is how Dragonslayer Diana came to be.
If they make this a skin, I'm gonna start playing diana again.
wtf .. nice but she is doing the splits
